editor.label: Application Server - IIS6 StopWebSite
editor.description: This procedure stops a web site.

formElement.label: Host name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the host name of the IIS Server (if the procedure is run on the host itself, use "localhost").

formElement.label: Web server name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the site identification number to attach to the site that you want to stop.
